as_at_date.title: As at Date
as_at_date.description: The date when this financial record was calculated

year.title: Year
year.description: The financial year in which these figures relate to

actual_budget_plan.title: Actual/Budget/Plan
actual_budget_plan.description: A category value to indicate if the figure represents actual, budgeted or planned values

category.title: Category
category.description: The category represents the organisational branch for this financial measure

description.title: Description
description.description: Category value (one of: Permanent full time, Permanent part time, Total casuals and other) representing the contractual arrangement for each category

value_000.title: Value ($,000)
value_000.description: The dollar (AUD) in thousands for this financial indicator
